entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
